Title: Lez Girls
Plot: Bette's forbidden relationship with her TA, Nadia, could jeopardize her career. Alice, on the other hand, ends her affair with a married woman after meeting her husband. She also gets upset by one of Jenny's short stories which gets published in a magazine. Meanwhile, Angus is caught in a compromising position.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Contains drug use, sex scenes and offensive language
GuestStars: Caroline Cave,  MacGareo Thomas,  Fraser Corbett,  Alyssa Pridham,  Ken Tremblett,  Pablo Silveira,  Dean Paul Gibson,  Bryan Demore,  Ulla Friis,  Bruce Davison,  Heather Matarazzo,  Steven Eckholdt
